sense.name: nowadays
sense.commentary: the period of time that is happening now; any continuous stretch of time including the moment of speech
sense.examples: That is enough for the present. He lives in the present with no thought of tomorrow.

sense.name: gift
sense.examples: His tie was a present from his wife.

sense.name: verb tense
sense.commentary: a verb tense that expresses actions or states at the time of speaking
sense.examples: Beginners always learn to conjugate verbs into the present, at first. Even the present tense conjugations can look strange for irregular verbs.
